name: The Bell Tower (2/10)
description:
William (You) lives in a bell tower. He must ring the bell in order to keep the tower. He must eat, sleep clean and groom himself too.  But there is a monster who probably wants him dead. 

(This game was made for the "Make 10 Short Games! Variety Magajam 2020".)

--Warning-- This game has flashing lights and jumpscares.
